content.question: A student catches a water balloon of mass <math alttext="m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi></math> that has speed <math alttext="v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>v</mi></math> just before the balloon reaches the student. The student brings the balloon to a complete stop by exerting an average force <math alttext="F sub average" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>F</mi><mtext>avg</mtext></msub></mstyle></math> over a time <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math>. The student then catches a second water balloon that has mass <math alttext="4 m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>m</mi></math>, also traveling at speed <math alttext="v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>v</mi></math>, by exerting a force over a time <math alttext="2 t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>t</mi></math>. What is the average force the student exerted on the second balloon?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction F sub average, end sub, over 8" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><msub><mi>F</mi><mtext>avg</mtext></msub><mn>8</mn></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction F sub average, end sub, over 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><msub><mi>F</mi><mtext>avg</mtext></msub><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="2 F sub average" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>F</mi><mtext>avg</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="8 F sub average" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>8</mn><msub><mi>F</mi><mtext>avg</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="2 F sub average" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>F</mi><mtext>avg</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
